testsuite.name: User add a product to cart and proceed to payment page

property.name: featureName
property.value: User add a product to cart and proceed to payment page

testcase.classname: CucumberJUnitReport-chrome.92_0_4515_131.windows.User add a product to cart and proceed to payment page
testcase.name: Validate product selected has been displayed on payment page
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the login page✅ And I should see a email field is displayed✅ When I enter the required login details✅ And I click sign in button on the page✅ Then I successfully logged into to ecomm web app✅ When I browser the required product and add into cart✅ And I proceed to payment page with required details✅ Then I successfully verified the selected product on payment page
